channel.title: Project Insanity - clean
channel.description:
Uhh took an hour or two out of my day to make this, so enjoy it; because it's decent!
Features:
[ul][*]Game engine. [*]Flag system - real flags that update no bull. [*]Jagcached - jaggrab, OnDemand server, file server, login server. [*]NPC path finder. [*]NPC Definitions. [*]Entity based players and npc's. [*]Fully working A-star(A*) player following. [*]Cleaned a lot of the packets - was going to re-do but don't have time. [*]Perfected combat. [*]Game objects. [*]Game object definitions. [*]The server has pretty much turned into an event-based server. [*]Total re-package of the server. [*]Pretty much cleaned - no minigames, skills or miscellaneous stoof .[/ul]
And lots of other stuff.
Server download: [url=http://uppit.com/oxueeh67phji/Server.rar]Download Server.rar @ UppIT[/url] Client download: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/474034-updated-317-client-loading-474-data.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/474034-updated-317-client-loading-474-data.html[/url]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/593/fip4.png/][IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/7748/fip4.png[/img][/URL]
Any problems regarding updating, replace: [code] c.updateRequired = true; c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);[/code]
with this: [code]c.getUpdateFlag().flag(Flag.APPEARANCE); c.updateRequired = true;[/code]
because I'm an idiot and missed a few flags :palm:.

item.title: Project Insanity - clean
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

the netty 3.2 jar is already there(unless there is another?)

Yeah I have every intention of using an IDE. I am just trying to clear up all compiler issues for anybody who is going to just attempt to leech and who doesn’t know how to.

Way I see it, if they are going to leech they might as well leech something decent.

I don’t know a whole lot about apache( I take it, it’s similar to sql or something ~^ )

IS there a jar for that as well?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity - clean
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:9, topic:528632”][quote author=Smudgerx360 link=topic=647385.msg4355772#msg4355772 date=1377541207]
there’s still no run.bat :S?
[/quote]give me 24 hours will make you a working server run/compiler

@OP, I have decided to do my project on this will be making the development thread in a few days after I look over this and all. I want to make sure networking etc can’t be improved upon first.

Edit:

here is a run batch… keep in mind it’s pure assumption at this point until I get the compiler done so I can compile.

@echo off color c title My Project echo By Loveandpower "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/netty-3.2.jar; org.Server pause

compiler:

@echo off title Compiling color c echo Compiling by Loveandpower "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/netty-3.2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\org\rs2*.java src\org\rs2\core\*.java src\org\rs2\core\event\*.java src\org\rs2\core\event\impl\*.java src\org\rs2\core\task\*.java src\org\rs2\core\task\impl\*.java src\org\rs2\core\tick\*.java src\org\rs2\entity\*.java src\org\rs2\entity\player\*.java src\org\rs2\entity\player\combat\*.java src\org\rs2\entity\player\combat\magic\*.java src\org\rs2\entity\player\combat\melee\*.java src\org\rs2\entity\player\combat\ranged\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\dispatch\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\fs\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\net\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\net\jaggrab\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\net\ondemand\*.java src\org\rs2\jagcached\net\service\*.java src\org\rs2\network\*.java src\org\rs2\network\login\*.java src\org\rs2\network\packets\*.java src\org\rs2\network\packets\impl\*.java src\org\rs2\util\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\impl\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\impl\world\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\impl\world\item\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\impl\world\npc\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\impl\world\pathfinder\*.java src\org\rs2\util\cache\impl\world\pathfinder\region\*.java pause

jesus that took longer than I thought.

@op I am getting some errors with the jaggrab. If you could please assist me would be great.

http://pastebin.com/sNt6aMSX

Are there a couple of files missing?

Edit again lol: it appears you was using jboss and deleted it ? ~^

Also the run batch gives me this

[code=java]By Loveandpower
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/mina/commo
n/IoAcceptor
at java.lang.Class.getDeclaredMethods0(Native Method)
at java.lang.Class.privateGetDeclaredMethods(Class.java:2521)
at java.lang.Class.getMethod0(Class.java:2764)
at java.lang.Class.getMethod(Class.java:1653)
at sun.launcher.LauncherHelper.getMainMethod(LauncherHelper.java:494)
at sun.launcher.LauncherHelper.checkAndLoadMain(LauncherHelper.java:486)

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.mina.common.IoAcceptor
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:424)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:308)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:357)
… 6 more
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

I do assume though that it just is referring to it cause I haven’t compiled ( cause of the errors in compiler )[/quote]

you need the netty jar for the jaggrab and apache for the server. i was gonna make the whole server netty but didn’t have enough time.
if your not using and IDE i suggest using Eclipse.

Read full topic

jesus that took longer than I thought.

@op I am getting some errors with the jaggrab. If you could please assist me would be great.

http://pastebin.com/sNt6aMSX

Are there a couple of files missing?

Edit again lol: it appears you was using jboss and deleted it ? ~^

Also the run batch gives me this

[code=java]By Loveandpower
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/mina/commo
n/IoAcceptor
